0111001101000010 0101101100110000 1 -> sum: 1100111001110011, cout: 0
0101011100111001 0011001100010100 0 -> sum: 1000101001001101, cout: 0
0100001101010101 1000001101100111 0 -> sum: 1100011010111100, cout: 0
1100111100011000 0001101001000010 1 -> sum: 1110100101011011, cout: 0
1101010011010010 1111111010011100 1 -> sum: 1101001101101111, cout: 1
0010010111111010 1010001101000101 1 -> sum: 1100100101000000, cout: 0

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
